```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(epca)
```

## Example


```{r cars}
n = 500
p = 50
A = matrix(runif(n*p), n, p)
A = scale(A, center = T, scale = F) ## WLOG assume A is centered by col
S = smd(A, k = 7, side = 'both', quiet = F)
```
